acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process module¶

Created on Fri Oct 16 14:08:07 2015

@author: chxmr

acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process.ale_gage(site, network)[source]¶
acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process.attributes(ds, species, site, global_attributes=None, units=None, scale=None, sampling_period=None)[source]¶

Format attributes for netCDF file

acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process.crds(site, network, input_directory=None, output_directory=None)[source]¶

Process CRDS data

site : Three letter site code network : Network string only for output

acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process.crds_data_read(data_file)[source]¶
acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process.decc_data_freeze()[source]¶
acrg_GCWerks.cf_data_process.gc(site, instrument, network, input_directory=None, output_directory=None)[source]¶

Process GC data per site and instrument Instruments can be:

“GCMD”: GC multi-detector (output will be labeled GC-FID or GC-ECD) “GCMS”: GC ADS (output GC-ADS) “medusa”: GC medusa (output GC-MEDUSA)

Network is the network name for output file.
